text: My first time buying a wheelchair and glad to have bought it from Assisted Living. Good product quality and great service provided! The staff was really knowledgeable in explaining the differences between each model available and also very patient in answering most of my queries, in which honestly made it easier for me to determine the most suitable wheelchair for a family member of mine. She took in efforts to truly understand the user's requirements before recommend a few models. Really appreciate and thankful for such pleasent purchasing experience provided by the staff and company!
Many different wheelchair models for selection. Staff is very friendly and explain in details. Easy to get parking within the same building. Direct access with lift.
Great customer service for my Haenim product!
